author: Bohdan Grytsenko
title: User profiles storage and management
name: AccountStorageAdapter

inputs.name: fieldName
inputs.description: string code of data attribute to be removed

abiDocs.name: isAllowedFieldName
abiDocs.details: used to check if specific attribute code is part of defined user profile.
abiDocs.return: true if attribute is part of user profile, false if it's not
abiDocs.notice: used to check if specific attribute code is part of defined user profile

abiDocs.name: getFieldLastVerificationData
abiDocs.details: used to receive verification details for specific attribute of user account
abiDocs.return: if verification exists returns it's status { None, Created, Verified, Unverified, Canceled }, verification contract address and timestamp when verification has been completed
abiDocs.notice: used to receive verification details for specific attribute of user account

inputs.name: fieldName
inputs.description: string code of data attribute to be removed

abiDocs.name: removeAllowedFieldName
abiDocs.details: used to reduce set of attributes valid to be part of user profile. Available only for Kimlic superuser or this contract owner
abiDocs.notice: used to reduce set of attributes valid to be part of user profile

abiDocs.name: renounceOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

inputs.name: fieldName
inputs.description: string code for new data attribute

abiDocs.name: addAllowedFieldName
abiDocs.details: used to define set of attributes valid to be part of user profile. Available only for Kimlic superuser or this contract owner
abiDocs.notice: public methods ///used to define set of attributes valid to be part of user profile

abiDocs.name: setFieldMainData
abiDocs.details: used to set value of specific attribute
abiDocs.notice: used to set value of specific attribute

abiDocs.name: getFieldDetails
abiDocs.details: used by user profile sync functionality - returns details for specific attribute of particular user. Available only for user himself, owner of this contract or Kimlic superuser
abiDocs.notice: used by user profile sync functionality - returns details for specific attribute of particular user

abiDocs.name: getFieldHistoryLength
abiDocs.details: used to receive historical version number for specific attribute of user account
abiDocs.return: returns 0 if attribute has never been set, if it was - history version number
abiDocs.notice: used to receive historical version number for specific attribute of user account

abiDocs.name: setRewardedAt
abiDocs.details: marks specific milestone as achieved for user account. Available for usage by RewardingContract only
abiDocs.return: returns 0 if attribute has never been set, if it was - history version number
abiDocs.notice: marks specific milestone as achieved for user account

abiDocs.name: getFieldLastMainData
abiDocs.details: used to receive specific attribute value of user account
abiDocs.return: attribute value if it it exists or 0x0
abiDocs.notice: used to receive specific attribute value of user account

abiDocs.name: getRewardedAt
abiDocs.details: checks if user account has been already rewarded for specific milestone
abiDocs.return: returns 0x0 if user was not rewarded, 0x1 if reward has been already granted
abiDocs.notice: checks if user account has been already rewarded for specific milestone

inputs.name: newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

abiDocs.name: getLastFieldVerificationContractAddress
abiDocs.details: used to check if there is already verification contract for specific attribute of user account
abiDocs.return: address of verification contract if any or 0x0
abiDocs.notice: used to check if there is already verification contract for specific attribute of user account
